name: Imanuel Urip Subekti
title: Software Engineer
about_me: I am a Full-stack Developer with strong passion to learn new things. I am familiar with some JS frameworks include frontend and backend, and I have worked for more than four years at startup companies.
Currently, I am interested and learning about flutter and go. I enjoy watching movies in my spare time.

what_im_doing.label: Web Development
what_im_doing.description: High-quality development of sites at the professional level.

what_im_doing.label: Mobile Apps
what_im_doing.description: Professional development of applications for iOS and Android.

experiences.description: Working in B2C team as a Fullstack Developer
After three months I was transferred to Luna POS, a startup held by the same CTO as Clodeo as a full-stack developer. I and my team built it from scratch.
Work in a team as a frontend web developer and we use Angular Framework to build the clodeo web app.
Before graduating, while spending my spare time I worked part-time as a full stack web developer

experiences.school: Computer Laboratory Assistant, Mathematic Department, Education University of Indonesia (UPI)
experiences.description: Besides helping students in practicum. I also built several web-based applications including library information systems, alumnus information systems, and books lending systems. All of them, I build using PHP with CodeIgniter Framework.
